Package com.xebisco.yield

Class ComponentBehavior

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xebisco.yield.ComponentBehavior
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Behavior, DefaultAxis, Disposable, Renderable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractRenderable, AnimationPlayer, AudioPlayer, Collider, InputUI, PhysicsBody, TextureRectangleLoader
    public abstract class ComponentBehavior
extends java.lang.Object
implements Behavior, Renderable
    ComponentBehavior is an abstract class that implements the Behavior and Renderable interfaces. This the class is declared as abstract. This means that it cannot be instantiated. It is only meant to be extended by other classes

      • getComponent

        public <T extends ComponentBehavior> T getComponent​(java.lang.Class<T> componentType,
                                                    int index)
        Get the component of the specified type at the specified index. The first line of the function is a generic type declaration. This is a way of saying that the function will return a component of the specified type
        Parameters:
        componentType - The type of component you want to get.
        index - The index of the component you want to get.
        Returns:
        A component of the specified type.
